[

{title, "Panel Element"},

{see_also, [base, rounded_panel, span]},

{usage, "
#panel { body=[
	#label { text=\"Label\" },
	#value { text=\"Value\" },
	#button { text=\"Continue\", postback=continue }
]}
"},

{description, "The panel element produces an HTML div."},

{attributes, [

	{"body", "Nitrogen element or list of elements.", "Set the element or elements that will be rendered within this panel."}
	
]}

].
